title: Detective Dr Phil, Lightly Threatened 11.6.19
itunes:title: Detective Dr Phil, Lightly Threatened 11.6.19
description:
In episode 510, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Guy Montgomery to discuss the sneak preview of Dr Phil's interview with the Ukrainian orphan, RNC funding robocalls to fight the impeachment, the White House putting Marie Yovanovitch's safety in danger, Rudy Giuliani's associate possibly flipping, how the Amazon Echo/Google Home can be hacked by lasers, someone being killed over a Popeye's chicken sandwich, what happened to Deadspin, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. WATCH: Ukrainian Orphan: Child or Adult Sociopath? The Exclusive Interview
  2. RNC funded effort to jam House Democrats' office phone lines amid impeachment fight: report
  3. White House Appears to Have Concocted Threat Against Marie Yovanovitch’s Safety
  4. It looks like Trump and Giuliani's efforts to intimidate and bully the former Ukrainian ambassador went much further than publicly known
  5. Lev Parnas, Giuliani Associate, Opens Talks With Impeachment Investigators
  6. Trump Begins Paris Accord Exit, Devices Hacked With Lasers, and More News
  7. POPEYES MADNESS FATAL STABBING OVER CHICKEN SANDWICH
  8. What Happened to Deadspin, According to the People Who Were There
  9. WATCH: The Avalanches - The Wozard of Iz [Music Video]

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
